Package server.game.managers.snakemanager

Class PlayerSnake

java.lang.Object
server.game.managers.snakemanager.Snake
server.game.managers.snakemanager.PlayerSnake
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameConstants, PathConstants
public class PlayerSnake
extends Snake
A subclass of Snake which retrieves ai movements from the ai handler
